resources.string:
1. Click on the "Get your location" button. 
2.Application will get point your current location and remember it. 
3. Click on the "Start navigate!" button to let app track you to saved position! 

 PS. App can be paused without losing data!
Your device doesn\'t support that app
You don\'t have any point. Get it now!
You already have saved location. Do you want to delete it?
You already have saved location. Do you want to get new location?
You must get your position first.
You don\'t have any saved point.
